alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Hill County; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 31 at 11:42AM MDT until April 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Fergus County below 4500ft, Hill County, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap, Northern Blaine County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty strong winds can blow away outdoor loose objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
